select-percentage-desc:
*What percentage of pumps you want to detect?*

The lower the value, the more notifications.
select-pairs-desc:
*Please define comma-separated pairs you want to track*

*Example:* BTCUSDT, ETHUSDT

_P.S In case of mistakes settings will be ignored_
exclude-pairs-desc:
*Please define comma-separated pairs you want to exclude*

*Example:* BTCUSDT, ETHUSDT

_P.S In case of mistakes settings will be ignored_
